txt.en: As you examine this fallen dwarf for signs of life, you notice a half-written scroll clutched in his hand.\n\nSadly, no dwarves survived this onslaught, but the scroll should be investigated, for surely it was important to this poor fellow.
The faint sounds of battle at Hadâd-mezer can be heard in the distance.
The sounds of battle draw nearer as you grow closer to Hadâd-mezer.
A voice cries out as the sounds of battle abruptly come to an end....
Many dwarves were sent out into the Flaming Deeps to rid the halls of invading Orcs, but unexpected enemy reinforcements signalled trouble for the dwarves.
You have arrived at Hadâd-mezer; you should search for signs of survivors.
The fallen Dwarf still clutches a half-written scroll.
The faint sounds of battle at Hadâd-mezer can be heard in the distance
The sounds of battle draw nearer as you grow closer to Hadâd-mezer

'Thank you for stopping to speak with me, traveller. We have been leading an assault on the Orcs, but were overtaken by a much larger force than we prepared for. I got away, but have sustained a serious injury.

'I am too hurt to travel, but I would appreciate if you could go check to see if there were any additional survivors at Hadâd-mezer.

'Hadâd-mezer can be found to the north-west. Just... follow the sounds of battle.'
A voice cries out as the sounds of battle abruptly come to an end...
Hadâd-mezer can be found to the south-east of Anazârmekhem in the Flaming Deeps, or north-west of Bensi's camp.\n\nYou should follow the sounds of battle and search for survivors at Hadâd-mezer.

'We recently sent three groups of dwarves into the Flaming Deeps in an attempt to drive away the invading Orcs, but I believe something has gone badly for our folk. Sounds of battle are coming from Hadad-mezer and I fear for the group that ventured there.\n\n'Please go search Hadâd-mezer, south-east of Anazârmekhem, and look for survivors. If you hear sounds of battle, I believe you will be heading the right way.'
You have arrived at Hadâd-mezer; you should search for signs of survivors
The voice that cried out seems to have come from the western part of Hadâd-mezer.\n\nYou should search for any dwarves that may have survived the battle.

As you examine this fallen dwarf for signs of life, you notice a half-written scroll clutched in his hand.\n\nSadly, no dwarves survived this onslaught, but the scroll should be investigated, for surely it was important to this poor fellow.
Follow the sounds of battle to Hadâd-mezer
Search for survivors in western Hadâd-mezer
Look for survivors
Sole Survivors
